entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain mixed with rain. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain or rain overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
